Description: This ad is for a 2016 Epiphone Les Paul Custom Pro Electric Cutaway Guitar. The most versatile solid body guitar in the world!!! With Three Way Switching, Coil Splitting & Coil tapping; you have an endless list of tones & sounds. These new Custom Pros are as close as you can get to their "big brothers", the Gibson LP's. This guitar is set up with low action, and is the easiest to play of all the LP's I've ever played. Les Paul guitars are designed to play every kind of music known to man; you won't go wrong with this guitar. The guitar is in near mint condition; nothing of any consequence to note. The sticker on the back of the headstock has "2016" on it; but the serial number makes this a 2017 model. Either way, it is in near new condition. NO INTERNATIONAL BIDDING, OR SHIPPING!! NO ALASKA, NO HAWAII, NO P.R., OR ANY OTHER US PROTECTORATE!!! CONTIGUOUS FORTY-EIGHT STATES ONLY!!!NO RETURNS; SO BE SURE YOU WANT IT BEFORE YOU BID!!!
